actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to extend the inapplicability of State usury ceilings to certain obligations issued to small businesses, agricultural entities, and other concerns by member banks and their affiliates.

summary.text: Extends until 1980 the inapplicability of State usury ceilings to certain obligations issued to small businesses, agricultural entitles, and other concerns by Federal Reserve member banks and their affiliates.

titles.title: A bill to extend the inapplicability of State usury ceilings to certain obligations issued to small businesses, agricultural entities, and other concerns by member banks and their affiliates.
